Bash(python -c "
from src.services.nlp_parser import nlp_parser
from src.models.nlp_command import NaturalLanguageCommand
from src.models.parsed_command import ParsedCommand, IntentType

# Test various commands to see how they''re now processed
test_commands = [
    ''add new task name task 01 and description them new task'',
    ''add task name buy groceries and description them go to market'',
    ''create task name complete project and description them finish by friday'',
    ''add new task title task 01 and description them new task'',
    ''add task title task 01 description them new task''
]

print\(''Testing improved NLP parser:''\)
for cmd in test_commands:
    parsed = nlp_parser.parse_command\(cmd\)
    print\(f''Command: {cmd}''\)
    print\(f''  Intent: {parsed.intent}''\)
    print\(f''  Confidence: {parsed.confidence}''\)
    print\(f''  Entities: {parsed.entities}''\)
    print\(\)
")

Bash(python -c "
from src.services.command_processor import get_command_processor
from src.models.nlp_command import NaturalLanguageCommand
from src.database import engine, SessionLocal
from uuid import UUID

# Create a mock database session
db = SessionLocal\(\)

# Test processing a command with extracted entities
try:
    # Create a mock user for testing
    from src.models.user import User
    from src.auth.jwt import create_access_token
    import uuid
    
    # Create a test user if not exists
    user = db.query\(User\).filter\(User.email == ''test@example.com''\).first\(\)
    if not user:
        user = User\(
            id=uuid.uuid4\(\),
            email=''test@example.com'',
            name=''Test User'',
            password_hash=''fake_hash''
        \)
        db.add\(user\)
        db.commit\(\)
        db.refresh\(user\)
    
    user_id = str\(user.id\)
    
    # Create a command processor
    processor = get_command_processor\(db, user_id\)
    
    # Test command
    nlp_cmd = NaturalLanguageCommand\(
        raw_input=''add new task name task 01 and description them new task'',
        user_id=user_id,
        timestamp=None
    \)
    
    print\(''Testing command processor with NLP command...''\)
    result = processor.process_command\(nlp_cmd\)
    
    print\(f''Command: {nlp_cmd.raw_input}''\)
    print\(f''Result: {result}''\)
    print\(\)
    
    # Test another command
    nlp_cmd2 = NaturalLanguageCommand\(
        raw_input=''create task name meeting and description them discuss budget'',
        user_id=user_id,
        timestamp=None
    \)
    
    print\(''Testing command processor with second command...''\)
    result2 = processor.process_command\(nlp_cmd2\)
    
    print\(f''Command: {nlp_cmd2.raw_input}''\)
    print\(f''Result: {result2}''\)
    
finally:
    db.close\(\)
")

Bash(python -c "
import re

# Test the regex pattern
text = ''add task name groceries and description them buy milk and bread''
pattern = r''add\\s+task\\s+name\\s+\(.+?\)\\s+and\\s+description\\s+them\\s+\(.+\)''

match = re.search\(pattern, text\)
if match:
    title = match.group\(1\).strip\(\)
    description = match.group\(2\).strip\(\)
    print\(f''Text: {text}''\)
    print\(f''Pattern: {pattern}''\)
    print\(f''Match found!''\)
    print\(f''  Group 1 \(title\): ""{title}""''\)
    print\(f''  Group 2 \(description\): ""{description}""''\)
else:
    print\(''No match found''\)

# Test another case
text2 = ''add task name buy groceries and description them go to market''
match2 = re.search\(pattern, text2\)
if match2:
    title2 = match2.group\(1\).strip\(\)
    description2 = match2.group\(2\).strip\(\)
    print\(f''\\nText: {text2}''\)
    print\(f''Match found!''\)
    print\(f''  Group 1 \(title\): ""{title2}""''\)
    print\(f''  Group 2 \(description\): ""{description2}""''\)
else:
    print\(''\\nNo match found for second test''\)
")

Bash(python -c "
from src.services.nlp_parser import nlp_parser
import re

# Test preprocessing
original_text = ''add task name groceries and description them buy milk and bread''
processed_text = nlp_parser.preprocess_text\(original_text\).lower\(\)

print\(f''Original: {original_text}''\)
print\(f''Processed: {processed_text}''\)

# Test the pattern on both
pattern = r''add\\s+task\\s+name\\s+\(.+?\)\\s+and\\s+description\\s+them\\s+\(.+\)''

match_orig = re.search\(pattern, original_text.lower\(\)\)
if match_orig:
    print\(f''\\nPattern matches original:''\)
    print\(f''  Title: ""{match_orig.group\(1\)}""''\)
    print\(f''  Description: ""{match_orig.group\(2\)}""''\)
else:
    print\(''\\nPattern does not match original''\)

match_proc = re.search\(pattern, processed_text\)
if match_proc:
    print\(f''\\nPattern matches processed:''\)
    print\(f''  Title: ""{match_proc.group\(1\)}""''\)
    print\(f''  Description: ""{match_proc.group\(2\)}""''\)
else:
    print\(''\\nPattern does not match processed''\)
")

Bash(python -c "
from src.services.nlp_parser import nlp_parser
import re

# Test what happens during parsing
text = ''add task name groceries and description them buy milk and bread''
print\(f''Input text: {text}''\)
print\(f''Lowercase: {text.lower\(\)}''\)

# Test complex pattern directly
complex_pattern = r''add\\s+task\\s+name\\s+\(.+?\)\\s+and\\s+description\\s+them\\s+\(.+\)''
match = re.search\(complex_pattern, text.lower\(\)\)

if match:
    print\(f''Complex pattern matched!''\)
    print\(f''  Group 1 \(title\): ""{match.group\(1\)}""''\)
    print\(f''  Group 2 \(description\): ""{match.group\(2\)}""''\)
else:
    print\(''Complex pattern did NOT match''\)

# Now test with the actual parser
parsed = nlp_parser.parse_command\(text\)
print\(f''\\nParsed entities: {parsed.entities}''\)
")

Bash(python -c "
import re

text = ''add task name groceries and description them buy milk and bread''
text_lower = text.lower\(\)

complex_patterns = [
    r''add\\s+new\\s+task\\s+name\\s+\(.+?\)\\s+and\\s+description\\s+them\\s+\(.+\)'',  # 1
    r''create\\s+new\\s+task\\s+name\\s+\(.+?\)\\s+and\\s+description\\s+them\\s+\(.+\)'',  # 2
    r''create\\s+task\\s+name\\s+\(.+?\)\\s+and\\s+description\\s+them\\s+\(.+\)'',  # 3
    r''add\\s+task\\s+name\\s+\(.+?\)\\s+description\\s+them\\s+\(.+\)'',  # 4
    r''add\\s+task\\s+name\\s+\(.+?\)\\s+and\\s+description\\s+them\\s+\(.+\)'',  # 5
    r''add\\s+new\\s+task\\s+title\\s+\(.+?\)\\s+and\\s+description\\s+them\\s+\(.+\)'',  # 6
    r''add\\s+task\\s+title\\s+\(.+?\)\\s+description\\s+them\\s+\(.+\)'',  # 7
    r''\(?:add|create|make\)\\s+\(?:new\\s+\)?\(?:task|todo|item\)\\s+\(?:name|title\)\\s+\(.+?\)\\s+\(?:and\\s+description|description\)\\s+\(?:them|is|to|as\)?\\s+\(.+\)'',  # 8
]

print\(f''Testing text: {text_lower}\\n''\)

for i, pattern in enumerate\(complex_patterns\):
    match = re.search\(pattern, text_lower\)
    if match:
        print\(f''Pattern {i+1} MATCHED:''\)
        print\(f''  Pattern: {pattern}''\)
        print\(f''  Group 1: ""{match.group\(1\)}""''\)
        print\(f''  Group 2: ""{match.group\(2\)}""''\)
        print\(f''  Full match: ""{match.group\(0\)}""''\)
        break
else:
    print\(''No patterns matched''\)
")

# Comprehensive test

    # Original complex patterns

    ''add task title task 01 description them new task'',
    ''add new task name complete project and description them finish by friday'',
    ''create task name meeting and description them discuss budget'',

Bash(python -c "
from src.services.nlp_parser import nlp_parser
from src.models.nlp_command import NaturalLanguageCommand
from src.models.parsed_command import ParsedCommand, IntentType

# Test the specific problematic command
test_commands = [
    ''add task title grocery shopping and description them buy milk, eggs, and bread'',
    ''add task title meeting agenda and description them prepare for tomorrow\\''s discussion'',
]

print\(''Testing fixed pattern for task title with ""and"":''\)
for cmd in test_commands:
    parsed = nlp_parser.parse_command\(cmd\)
    print\(f''Command: {cmd}''\)
    print\(f''  Intent: {parsed.intent}''\)
    if parsed.entities:
        for entity in parsed.entities:
            print\(f''    {entity[""type""]}: ""{entity[""value""]}""''\)
    print\(f''  Confidence: {parsed.confidence:.2f}''\)
    print\(\)
")
